tree.name: Thomas Bryant
tree.note: Center signed one-year contract after playing for Miami and Indiana previous season | 1yr/$3.3M

tradeChain.name: Thomas Bryant
tradeChain.tradeDescription: Drafted 42nd overall by Utah, traded to Lakers along with Josh Hart for Lakers' 28th pick (Tony Bradley)
tradeChain.note: Center from Indiana University, acquired by Lakers from Jazz on draft night
